TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DefaultAuthenticationModule extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpModule
Public NotInheritable Class DefaultAuthenticationModule Implements IHttpModule
public ref class DefaultAuthenticationModule sealed : System::Web::IHttpModule

summary.span: 确保上下文中存在身份验证对象。

span.span: Ensures that an authentication object is present in the context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确保 将当前实例的属性 设置为 每个请求的对象。The ensures that the property of the current instance is set to an object for each request. 在 事件之后、事件发生之前检查属性 。The examines the property after the event and before the event. 如果 属性为 `null` ，则将 属性设置 为 不包含用户信息的对象。If the property is `null`, the sets the property to a object that contains no user information. 如果身份验证模块将 属性设置为401，则 将呈现 "拒绝访问" 错误页。If the authentication module sets the property to 401, the will render an access-denied error page. 如果将属性的值 设置为大于200的值，则 对象将结束请求。If the value of the property is set to a value greater than 200, the object will end the request. 在这种情况下，仅在 完成当前请求之前调用订阅事件的 HTTP 模块。In that case, only HTTP modules that subscribe to the event are called prior to the completion of the current request. 公开 事件。The exposes an event. 您可以使用此事件为 当前实例的属性提供一个自定义对象 。You can use this event to provide a custom object for the property of the current instance. 通过在应用程序的 global.asax 文件中指定名为**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**的事件来访问事件。The event is accessed by specifying an event named **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the application's Global.asax file. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件来测试 当前实例的属性是否 为 `null` 。The following example uses the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to test whether the property of the current instance is `null`. 如果 属性为 `null` ，则此示例将 当前实例的属性设置为一个对象， 其中对象的 是值为 "default" 的。If the property is `null`, then the sample sets the property of the current instance to a object where the of the object is a with a value of "default." > [!NOTE] > 在事件前引发 **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件 。The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised before the event. 因此，如果您将 当前实例的属性设置 为自定义标识，则它可能会影响您的应用程序的行为。As a result, if you set the property of the current instance to a custom identity, it can affect the behavior of your application. 例如，如果您使用的是 类，并在 `` " [授权](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100)) 配置" 部分中指定，以确保只有经过身份验证的用户才能访问您的站点，此示例将导致忽略 [deny](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8aeskccd(v%3dvs.100)) 元素，因为该用户将具有 "默认" 的名称。For example, if you are using the class and you specify `` in the [authorization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section to ensure that only authenticated users have access to your site, this sample will cause the [deny](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8aeskccd(v%3dvs.100)) element to be ignored, as the user will have a name, which is "default." 相反，您需要指定 `` 以确保只有经过身份验证的用户才能访问您的站点。Instead, you would specify `` to ensure that only authenticated users can access your site. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不应从应用程序代码调用。This constructor is not intended to be called from application code. ASP.NET 调用此构造函数以创建类的实例 。ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the class. 调用构造函数后，它会调用 方法来初始化新的 对象。After calling the constructor, it calls the method to initialize the new object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Authenticate As DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler

summary.span: 对请求进行身份验证后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the request has been authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件 在事件之后引发 。The event is raised after the event. 它用于确保 使用对象填充当前实例的属性 。It is used to ensure that the property of the current instance is populated with an object. 可以 通过在应用程序的 global.asax 文件中指定名为 **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 的子程序来访问类的事件。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the application's Global.asax file. 可以 在 **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件中使用对象的属性，将 当前实例的属性设置 为自定义 对象。You can use the property of the object in the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current instance to a custom object. 如果没有为属性指定值 ，则会将实例的 属性设置 为 不包含用户信息的对象。If you do not specify a value for the property, the sets the property of the instance to a object that contains no user information. 在**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件之后 和事件之前引发 DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate 事件 。The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised after the event and before the event. 如果某个节依赖于要拒绝的用户名或允许对应用程序的访问，则修改 当前实例的属性 可能会影响应用程序的行为。If you have an section that depends on the user name to deny or allow access to your application, modifying the property of the current instance can affect the behavior of your application. 在配置中指定 "[授权](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100))" 部分时，请确保考虑在**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件中设置的用户名。Be sure that the user name you set during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is considered when you specify the [authorization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100)) section in your configuration. > [!NOTE] > 如果 Web 应用程序在集成模式下的 IIS 7.0 中运行，则 不会引发的事件。If the Web application is running in IIS 7.0 in Integrated mode, the event of the is not raised. 如果 `mode` [身份验证](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/532aee0e(v%3dvs.100)) 配置元素的属性设置为 "无"，并且应用程序订阅 事件，则 会引发错误。If the `mode` attribute of the [authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/532aee0e(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element is set to "None" and the application subscribes to the event, a error is raised. 在此方案中，若要接收身份验证通知，请订阅 实例的事件 。In this scenario, to receive authentication notification, subscribe to the event of the instance. 有关集成模式下兼容性问题的详细信息，请参阅将 [ASP.NET 应用程序从 iis 6.0 移到 iis 7.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847)。For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated mode, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件来测试 当前实例的属性是否 为 `null` 。The following code example uses the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to test whether the property of the current instance is `null`. 如果 属性为 `null` ，则此示例将 当前实例的属性设置为一个对象， 其中对象的 是值为 "default" 的。If the property is `null`, then the sample sets the property of the current instance to a object where the of the object is a with a value of "default." > [!NOTE] > 在事件前引发 **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件 。The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised before the event. 因此，如果您将 当前实例的属性设置 为自定义标识，则它可能会影响您的应用程序的行为。As a result, if you set the property of the current instance to a custom identity, it can affect the behavior of your application. 例如，如果您使用的是 类，并在 `` " [授权](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100)) 配置" 部分中指定，以确保只有经过身份验证的用户才能访问您的站点，此示例将导致忽略 [deny](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8aeskccd(v%3dvs.100)) 元素，因为该用户将具有 "默认" 的名称。For example, if you are using the class and you specify `` in the [authorization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section to ensure that only authenticated users have access to your site, this sample will cause the [deny](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8aeskccd(v%3dvs.100)) element to be ignored, as the user will have a name, which is "default." 相反，您需要指定 `` 以确保只有经过身份验证的用户才能访问您的站点。Instead, you would specify `` to ensure that only authenticated users can access your site. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应从应用程序代码调用。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 方法可确保事件的 处理中包括。The method ensures that the is included in the processing of events.
